rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
糖尿病患者的非 COVID-19 死亡率在大流行期间增加由马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校公共卫生研究人员领导的一项全球研究综述显示，在大流行期间，糖尿病患者中与 COVID-19 无关的死亡有所增加，糖尿病并发症视力丧失也有所增加，该研究审查了与大流行相关的影响对这一弱势群体造成的干扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Non-COVID-19-mortality-among-people-with-diabetes-increased-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Non-COVID-19-mortality-among-people-with-diabetes-increased-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79938d19-9f3c-44c2-b06c-7dff1bdeb4fe Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:45:59 -0500 Non-COVID-19 mortality among people with diabetes increased during the pandemic
膀胱和肠道发酵综合征：具有重大影响的罕见疾病研究回顾了膀胱发酵综合征（BFS）和肠道发酵综合征（GFS），强调了它们的病因、诊断和治疗，并强调了认识这些病症以避免戒断监测中误解的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Bladder-and-gut-fermentation-syndromes-Uncommon-disorders-with-significant-implications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Bladder-and-gut-fermentation-syndromes-Uncommon-disorders-with-significant-implications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0491680-2ece-4d38-b269-77f3f1945931 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:35:00 -0500 Bladder and gut fermentation syndromes: Uncommon disorders with significant implications
长期高血糖与上肢肌肉骨骼疾病之间的联系被发现研究表明，长期高血糖会显着增加上肢肌肉骨骼疾病的风险，而体重指数对腕管综合征和掌腱膜挛缩症的风险影响不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Link- Between-long-term-hyperglycemia-and-upper-limb-musculoskeletal-conditions-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Link- Between-long-term-hyperglycemia-and-upper-limb-musculoskeletal-conditions-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abde17de-f7bd-4f41-9e2c-dd9e626f07b0 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:19:00 -0500 Link between long-term hyperglycemia and upper-limb musculoskeletal conditions revealed
世卫组织发布医疗保健领域人工智能伦理指南，重点关注大型多模式模型世界卫生组织发布了关于医疗保健领域人工智能的道德使用和治理的指南，重点关注大型多模式模型（LMM），解决卫生部门的数据隐私、偏见和工作岗位流失等问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/WHO-issues-ethical-guidelines-for-AI-in-healthcare-focusing-on-large-multi-modal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/WHO-issues-ethical-guidelines-for-AI-in-healthcare-focusing-on-large-multi-modal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74ee0077-8779-48bb-a28d-85043b686452 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:01:00 -0500 WHO issues ethical guidelines for AI in healthcare, focusing on large multi-modal models
专家支持帮助患有严重精神疾病的新妈妈降低复发风险伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 与埃克塞特大学和伦敦卫生与热带医学院合作进行的新研究发现，有严重精神疾病史的女性面临着在可以接触社区围产期心理健康团队 (CPMHT) 的地区，产后复发的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Specialist-support-helps-new-moms-with-severe-mental-illness-reduce-relapse-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Specialist-support-helps-new-moms-with-severe-mental-illness-reduce-relapse-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cf96bb5-2e08-4a56-835e-2762375460e9 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:58:37 -0500 Specialist support helps new moms with severe mental illness reduce relapse risk
新的工作流程确定了共同的癌症靶点，推进了免疫治疗研究人员开发了剪接新抗原查找器 (SNAF) 工作流程，整合深度学习来识别癌症中共享的免疫原性新抗原，为癌症免疫治疗提供新靶点，特别是黑色素瘤和卵巢癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/New-workflow-identizes-shared-cancer-targets-advancing-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/New-workflow-identizes-shared-cancer-targets-advancing-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad41e9e1-9495-4104-891b-7b4f27b0c192 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:53:00 -0500 New workflow identifies shared cancer targets, advancing immunotherapy
患有多发性硬化症的年轻黑人和西班牙裔女性的病情比白人女性更糟糕虽然最近的疗法有可能阻止或延缓多发性硬化症的进展，但一项新的研究表明，年轻的黑人和西班牙裔女性的情况比年轻的白人女性更差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Young-Black-and-Hispanic-women-with-multiple-sclerosis-fare-worse-than-white-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Young-Black-and-Hispanic-women-with-multiple-sclerosis-fare-worse-than-white-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daf3b70c-69da-4be3-b0a5-99e2de00cec7 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:45:22 -0500 Young Black and Hispanic women with multiple sclerosis fare worse than white women
长时间坐着工作会增加死亡风险研究表明，长时间坐着工作会增加全因死亡率和心血管死亡率的风险，可以通过将久坐与非久坐活动交替进行以及每天进行 15-30 分钟的休闲身体活动来降低风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Prolonged-sitting-at-work-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Prolonged-sitting-at-work-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abe33e28-dd8c-4640-bc8e-9b3630907666 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:44:00 -0500 Prolonged sitting at work linked to increased mortality risk
联合药物治疗优于单独治疗治疗侵袭性前列腺癌复发由加州大学旧金山分校研究人员领导的一项多机构三期临床试验发现，在前列腺癌复发患者中联合使用睾酮阻断药物可以比单一药物治疗更好地预防癌症扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Combination-drug-therapy-beats-solo-treatment-for-aggressive-prostate-cancer-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Combination-drug-therapy-beats-solo-treatment-for-aggressive-prostate-cancer-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec3ce9f8-d14e-4fb9-b99d-e9944215af43 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:39:21 -0500 Combination drug therapy beats solo treatment for aggressive prostate cancer relapse
LTBR 被确定为癌症免疫治疗的潜在靶点和不良预后的标志一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 1 期，题为“Systematicanalysis of the prognostic value andimmunological LTBR 在人类癌症中的功能。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/LTBR-identified-as-pottial-target-for-cancer-immunotherapy-and-marker-of-poor-prognosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/LTBR-identified-as-pottial-target-for-cancer-immunotherapy-and-marker-of-poor-prognosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3ef7245-6ee1-4271-b48b-bc0ad0206aff Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:34:19 -0500 LTBR identified as potential target for cancer immunotherapy and marker of poor prognosis
